original_text: Others were assigned to take care of the furnishings and all the other articles of the sanctuary, as well as the special flour and wine, and the olive oil, incense and spices.
korean_text: 또 어떤 자는 성소의 기구와 모든 그릇과 고운 가루와 포도주와 기름과 유향과 향품을 맡았으며

sentences.original_text: Others were assigned to take care of the furnishings
and all the other articles of the sanctuary
as well as the special flour and wine
and the olive oil, incense and spices
